alert.note: Alert for Lower Hells Canyon, Salmon River Region (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Missoula (Western Montana and Central Idaho)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued November 04 at 2:08AM MDT until November 04 at 12:00PM MDT by NWS Missoula
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM PDT THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of one inch or less in the lowest elevations, including Riggins. 3 to 8 inches possible on higher benches and elevations, including US 95 over Whitebird Hill. Wind gusts up to 40 mph will lead to areas of blowing snow over Whitebird Hill. * WHERE...Lower Hells Canyon/Salmon River Region. * WHEN...From 11 PM this evening to 11 AM PDT Friday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be difficult. Wet, heavy snow will increase the risk of tree limb and power line damage for elevations above 3,000 feet.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Lower Hells Canyon, Salmon River Region
